channel.title: Chat box help
channel.description: hi im trying to have it say somthing in the chat box when the ppl log in and i went to client and put wat i want it to say under nomems, mems, mods, admin, co-owners, and owners...then i compiled it and it said 6 errors and i dont see wat i did wrong i followed wat the other messages ddi and i need help BAD... so plz help me out here... -Pure Jukes :D

item.title: Chat box help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_jukes Pure jukes
item.description:
@Pure_jukes wrote:

ok i got it thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Chat box help
item.dc:creator: @i_lured_i i lured i
item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

i’d gladly help if you can possibly show us the error and what you typed.

Here is what mine looks like. Hopefully you can use this to help you? Change the names and links btw

if(playerIsMember == 0) { sendMessage("Welcome to Affinityscape."); sendMessage("This account is not a member"); sendMessage("Type ::commands"); newWelc(); } if(playerIsMember == 1) { sendMessage("type ::commands"); sendMessage("This account is a member."); sendMessage("Apply for mod&admin at affinityscape.freeforums.org"); newWelc(); } if(playerRights == 3) { sendMessage("Omfg its Affinity!"); sendMessage("This account is a member, and you are an admin :)."); sendMessage("Check out ::info for a little information."); newWelc(); }

This is used for helping purposes. I am NOT using the links to advertise.

Read full topic
